snippet: If the author of the Patrick Melrose novels could meet any character from literature, he would choose Isabel Archer. And then he’d propose marriage.
abstract: By the Book column with Edward St Aubyn, author of the Patrick Melrose novels.
lead_paragraph: If the author of the Patrick Melrose novels could meet any character from literature, he would choose Isabel Archer. And then he’d propose marriage.

headline.main: Edward St. Aubyn: By the Book
